name: Dependency-setup
body:
# Install

## Node
If `terminal`/`cmd` is open, close it before continuing.

Go to http://nodejs.org/ to download and install Node.


## Bower

    $ [sudo] npm install -g bower grunt


## Grunt

    $ [sudo] npm install -g grunt-cli

***

> Note: You can install Bower and Grunt together with:
>
>    `$ [sudo] npm install -g bower grunt grunt-cli`


## Composer
Reference: [Composer Getting Started](https://getcomposer.org/doc/00-intro.md)


### Linux/ Unix / OSX

    $ curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | php
    $ [sudo] mv composer.phar /usr/local/bin/composer

> Note: In OSX Yosemite the /usr directory does not exist by default. If you receive the error "/usr/local/bin/composer: No such file or directory" then you must create /usr/local/bin/ manually before proceeding.


### Windows
Download an run [Composer-Setup.exe](https://getcomposer.org/Composer-Setup.exe).
